language.entry: Prothèse rudimentaire
Prothèse
Prothèse de qualité
Prothèse complexe
"Feu de fafnir"
Prothèse
Plastron abîmé
Plastron de bonne qualité
Plastron solide
Plastron en plomb
"La fin du monde"
Plastron

Une fusion sombre de métal et de chair, la Salamandre est devenue une machine de guerre vivante. Grâce à l’utilisation de son lance-flammes, elle peut infliger des attaques dévastatrices sur ses ennemis, sautant agilement avec ses griffes prothétiques, elle fait des ravages !

La Salamandre uttilise ses prothèses durant les combats, faisant bon usage de sa myriade de gadgets pour couper tout sur son passage. Sa plaque thoracique n’est pas une simple armure, elle est greffée à sa chair elle-même, offrant des capacités au-delà de celles d’un humain ordinaire.
La Salamandre est tout à fait autosuffisante, bricolant et améliorant à la fois ses prothèses et sa propre chair afin de s’optimiser pour les batailles à venir.
%d%% Damage Reflection
%d%% Torch Burn Rate
Suffer %d DMG
Je ne suis qu'une marionette et eux les maîtres des poupées...
Non... Je peux le réparer... Je peux le réparer !
Deus Ex Machina
Ce sinistre mercenaire semble plus machine que homme. Elle offre son équipement de pointe et... sa physiologie unique à notre cause.
Salamandre
Lance-flammes
Lance-flammes
Flame Gout
Souffle de la salamandre
Souffle de la salamandre
Salamander's Breath
Évacuation de la vapeur
Évacuation de la vapeur
Steam Vent
Pince-grappin
Pince-grappin
Grappling Claw
Dague véloce
Dague véloce
Pile Bunker
Lacération
Lacération
Lacerate
Balayette
Balayette
Sweep Kick
Déplacement
Surégime
Allumez le feu !
Addiction chiurgicale
Gloire Flamboyante
Flame Gout/Salamander's Breath/Steam Vent: +1 DMG
-10 DODGE if in position 2 or 3
Feraille
Aiguille brûlante
Réserve de carburant
Gants-crochets jumeaux
Grille d'évacuation
Coeur horloge
Prototype Mark I
Flamme froide
Phrothèse expérimentale
"Plus humain que les humains."
My body fails! My flesh is exposed!
Meat! I'm just meat!
My arms malfunction, my legs freeze up!
My designs... You all want my designs!
I won't let you steal my ideas!
I can hear it. Metal fatigue's setting in...
No one look at me!
Eyes everywhere...
Yes! Carve the meat away!
Crush me like a toy! Turn me into broken gears and put me back together!
Too much meat... I have too much meat! Take it away!
I want... I want to be ripped apart...
Please, take me apart! I will rebuild myself!
You're all so... soft. Ugh.
Inferior meat! Let me show you how it's done!
Worthless piles of organs is what you are.
Metal over man! This is the way!
Why am I still with you all? I'm worth a king's ransom alone!
I'm so much better than you, you, and ESPECIALLY you.
What...? What have I done?...
What have I become?...
I'm... nothing...
(chaotic whirring)
My chassis needs lubricant!
Man and machine convene! HAHAHAHAHAHA!
These pathetic beasts can't even touch me.
They'll never get through my armor!
We can kill anything they throw at us!
Never fear, these claws can shred anything.
Steel and fire, delivered with precision!
I'll bet you anything I won't miss again.
Flesh doesn't stand a sodding chance against my steel!
Ah, my blood boils! I'm unstoppable!!
I've never felt so alive! Every piece functions perfectly!
I'm never going to die! Ahhahahaha!
As long as my heart still ticks, I'm never going to stop.
I've come so far, I won't stop till I'm complete!
We won't fall. I have a flamethrower!
Stand with me! We cannot fail!
Hit 'em with mechanical efficiency!
You have a good eye!
Feel my power! Let's kill the bastards!
Nothing can stop us when I'm around!
Didn't even scratch the finish. Heh.
Just a dent, nothing more, easily fixed!
(brushes off shoulder)
My gears and flesh will all rot here!
Rust and rot, oh gods!...
We're going to die here! Die!
Your fault! This is all your fault!
You're all in it together, aren't you?
I know that look. You're just jealous of my enhancements!
More, I want more... More steel, more gears!
Let them take my blood, I’ll replace it with oil!
One day I’ll be complete. I can’t wait... Oh, I can’t wait!...
They should've sent me alone. Wouldn't be getting dragged down as much.
So weak, so fallible!
Your techniques are so limp-wristed. Pitiful, really.
I haven't seen a single one of you do anything worthwhile so far.
Need I remind you that I'll be needing your share for self maintenance.
Pfah! I could do all of your jobs tenfold!
I'm already a corpse...
I'm... nothing... a soulless meat puppet...
I carved away so much of myself. There's not much of me left...
Burn them all... BURN THEM ALL!...
Beep boop. Boop beep?
You know what really grinds my gears? (grinding and sputtering)
My armor fails! They'll kill us all!
I-I must live!
Get away! GET AWAY!
I have to get away from their gaze!
They’re trying to figure out my workings!
I can’t stand their eyes on my clockwork!
I’ll take their blows, you fall back!
Let them tear me apart! PLEASE!
You don't understand! I NEED this!
Recalculating...
Is... is that a new spanner? For me?!
Choo choo!
Recalculating...
Just popping into the shop for a checkup!
Oh, I think I dropped a rivet over here...
Just finish it already.
End me. I'm a monster.
I died a long time ago. Let's speed this up.
Just... give me a moment. One moment.
Look at me, skulking away again.
I'm awful. Don't... don't look at me.
Let me show you how we do it in Ostvengr!
Out of the way! I'll show them some real steel!
You call that a blade? THIS is a blade!
You're so good then you go first.
.....I'll be back.
Give me a moment to wind up...
My gears, they freeze!
My blood turns to dust!
(steam hissing chaotically)
It’s all a conspiracy...
Let me think, gods, let me think.
I just need... oil...
Not now, genius. I'm self repairing.
What? I'm just blowing off some steam. Really.
Hm, something's loose. Give me a mo'.
Let me rust here. At least what's left of me will feed the soil.
I've found my resting place. Though I don't deserve rest.
Let me just make a quick pit stop...
I have arrived at my destination!
(clockwork revving in anticipation)
Didn’t expect that, you bastards!
Got to be unpredictable...
You can’t follow that, eh?
I’ll risk it all to get what I need!
I know what I have to do!
This'll quench my thirst!
See? This is the proper way to do things!
I can't believe I have to teach you how to attack.
Ugh, just watch This is what you're meant to do.
Ugh. Fine, I'll show you.
Hands off, lads! This one's mine!
No guts, no glory!
...Whatever.
This'll do it. Or it'll explode on me. Hopefully the latter.
Hopefully this'll kill me.
(gleeful burst of steam)
My calculations dictate the most logical action is to...
Wheeeeee!
My body fails! I'll be trapped in this metal prison forever!
Snuff out the fire! They'll know we're here!
My arm keeps malfunctioning...
Keep your eyes to yourselves!
Don’t even think about looking at my gearing!
I know you all want to steal my work!
The fire’s beautiful on dented steel. I wish there was more.
Burn my flesh away on the campfire, and beneath, the glint of steel...
Do you dream? I dream of slicing away the rest of... (trails off)
So weak. So fleshy. So pathetic.
I'd respect you more if you could take the burn from the campfire.
If you where from where I'm from, you'd have been fed to the Tind'losi Hounds by now.
I'll be needing your coat, your boots, and your weapon.
I'll also need your shares, by the way. Upkeep is expensive.
I'll be leading from now on. Since you obviously can't.
I hope my body fails in my sleep. At least it'll be quick and painless that way.
Look at me, a deathless freak sent into hell...
I've done all this to myself, and for what?...
Ugh, you'd all look SO much better with some steel in you.
Give me a couple of hours and I'll have calculated every possible outcome from here!
Let me replace that hand? Please? Just a tiny little finger?
Slash me, break me, I can’t wait!
Look here, this bit of skin... Rip it off so I can replace it!
Take my bones, I will replace them with steel!
This is where my heart replacement is. Hit it.
Press this and I'll fall apart.
The flesh is temporary! Metal is eternal!
You can't beat me! I'm immortal!
If they won't rip my flesh off, I'll have to do it myself...
Ahh! There, yes, that’s it! (mechanical shuddering)
I guess I'll have to do it myself. Of course. (pulls out wrench)
I'm going to do what should've happened years ago.
AUTO-CREMATE! SELF-IMMOLATE!
Initiating self-destruct sequence!
No! You want to let them stab me in the back!
Fool, I won’t run into an ambush.
Let's just die here and make it quick. Not like we have much of a choice.
I've wanted this for so long. Don't take it from me.
Please, I need this. I need it!
Let me take just... just one more blow!
(annoyed click)
In two hundred meters, take a left turn...
No! Not the pistons!
(sputtering hiss of steam)
Take my flesh, but don’t hurt my machinery!
Please, not the clockwork!
Ugh! Why'd you let that happen!
Hands off the mechandise!
Yes, yes, hit me again!
More! MORE!
Oil! Oil, I said!
Nothing that can't be self-repaired!
If you're going to kill me, make it quick!
This is torture! Torture!
The steam, there’s something wrong with the steam...
They’re trying to distract me... they want the blueprints!
(steam hisses in frustration)
No! No, come back, damn you!
Aw, I was hoping to get the chance to recalibrate.
You idiot! You can't kill a machine!
Oi! I had that one!
Get your own kill! This one's mine!
...Is that all?
That was barely a hit. As expected from mere meat.
Finally! Something to replace!
You'll be like me soon. And you'll thank me for it.
(nervous clicking)
I knew it! We're doomed!
That was on purpose! I saw it!
Traitor! I’ll burn you!
Could you actually try for once in your worthless life?
Gods, you weren't even trying, were you.
Good. More for me.
Do I really have to do it for you? (sigh)
Damn it! ...I mean, what?
Hm, maybe next time then. (tucks away bonesaw)
It's all falling apart!
Oh Gods! I'm next!
They’ll tear us all to scrap!
The scrapheap! The scrapheap!
No, let them take me! ME!
You stole that hit! It could have been mine! It SHOULD be mine!
Pity it didn't take the rest of you with it.
Good. Saves me some time.
Oh, you've sprung a leak!
An oil replacement! YES!
They're drawing it out! Why would...!
Now's our chance! Run while we still can!
You’re all in it together!
What? Afraid to take a hit?
Don't worry! I can fix that aim of yours!
If only you'd accepted my offer before. Tsk tsk!
I-I can't! I won't!
(clanking and scraping)
Wait, I need... I need to think...
No, curse you, I won’t let you lead me astray!
(shakes head, panting)
(stands still, twitching)
Where do you think you're going?
What, afraid to get your hands dirty?
(unholy metallic screeching)
Wait! My calculations are almost finished!
This is defective. Or... sabotaged?
Bad workmanship. Throw it away.
I don’t need this. Let me bleed! It feels... It feels...
Ugh, no! Let me savor this!
That won't help. I'm not even human anymore.
Save it. I haven't been alive for years.
I can't use this! Fetch the breastplate stretcher!
This is a Phillips head! I asked for a flathead!
Want a closer look, eh? Back off!
Stand back! I see your inquisitive eyes.
Don’t even think about looking at my devices!
You don't understand. I can replace it!
DON'T TAKE THIS FROM ME!!
Don't touch me. I feel... good.
You can't fix me. Nothing can.
I'm not like you. I did it to myself.
There's not much of me left to heal.
I'd like to see your engineering license first...
Pfah! As if you know how to use a wrench!
Bandages? For metal? Ha!
You want to improve my gearing? Ha!
You don't know how any of this works, you moron.
Touch me and bleed.
Let me work out my own improvements.
Ha! I’ll fix myself up as I wish, thank you.
I was reborn in agony, you can't improve on it.
It's pointless. I'm no better than those monsters.
That won't help. Nothing can help me. Gods..
You'd just waste your time.
You can't improve on perfection!
*I* have a screw loose? What does that make you then?
It'll make it worse! I know it will!
I-it's malfunctioning again!
I can't... move... my limbs!...
I’m busy tinkering.
Don’t even try it, I have important work to do.
I won’t help that one. Can’t trust ‘em.
Feel the pain? Steel doesn’t feel pain.
I can’t help. I’m trying to decide what to replace next.
Why? Savor the sensation.
Oh you'd like to see how I work, huh.
It'd be wasted on this bunch.
Not when I'm surrounded by morons like these.
My talents are wasted here.
No, I don't think I will.
Maybe later, when I feel like it.
It's all falling apart anyway. What's the point.
Tinker as I might, I can't bring back my humanity.
It's all been for naught. I killed myself and created a monster.
System malfunction!
I'm sorry. I'm afraid I can't do that.
(sparking and twitching)
Back! Back I say! Get back or burn!
Talk? I’d rather talk to myself.
Don’t bother me. I don’t trust you.
Blood and oil running down my skin, my armor...
No, I'm... enjoying this feeling.
This is an opportunity to improve myself! I don't need you! Any of you!
Don't touch me, meat.
Pf. What could you possibly do to help me?
Get your grubby hands off me! Worthless offal.
Your time is more valuable than mine.
I'm broken beyond repair.
I'm just walking scrap. You can't do anything to help.
A heart? What would I want a heart for?
But that'd just clog up my gears!
Pah! As if I’d eat something you made.
(slowly, mechanically, flings her food to the ground)
The ache in my belly focuses my thoughts.
One day my stomach will be replaced with a boiler...
What for? I'm already a monster as is. Why pretend otherwise?
Just let me rust in peace.
Oil... can!...
Maybe I can rebuild myself from scratch? ...No?...
Want a closer look, eh? Let me show you!
You think I don’t see your eyes on me?! Take this!
Let me show you just how weak the flesh is!
Let me do you a favor and speed things up.
A mistake in the blueprints! I must rewrite it!
Oh, there's a loose screw here. Let me just tighten it up...
Take that, meat.
Precision Ostvengr engineering!
Ha-HA! How'd that taste!
You won't be repairing that!
If you could see my face, I'm grinning.
(gleeful mechanical revving)
(actuators clicking in satisfaction)
(steam hisses ferociously)
Machine triumphs over man! ...Again.
Its claws are like cold steel!
Bones turned machine. Fascinating...
Isee my blood... it turns to rust...!
Ah, what a rush!
I've always liked how the flames dance...
(hiss) Ah, it's a good hurt...
Ahhahahahaha!
Hm. You're not so bad, for just meat.
You even impressed me back there, you know.
Chin up. We can do this.
It's called cauterizing. Don't be such a baby.
Here. I have a spare needle and thread just for the occasion.
I can sew that up, just hold still. ...I said hold still!
How about a deal: we get through this and I'll take a look at that gear of yours. Might be able to upgrade it.
Pfah! From what I've seen, you wouldn't even need enhancements!
You're pretty good.
